lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Seattle on Friday granted a two-week extension to the Justice Department in a lawsuit alleging that President Donald Trump's immigration order is blocking efforts by legal residents to reunite with their children who are trapped in war-torn countries.

headline.main: Trump Team’s Links to Russia Crisscross in Washington
headline.print_headline: Washington, With Moscow on Its Mind
